Python Library Documentation¶

SimNIBS main programming language is Python. Here you can see documentation for the main modules used in SimNIBS.

  • simnibs.msh handles the I/O and manipulation of mesh files and data contained in mesh files

Index¶

  • simnibs.msh
    • I/O Functions
      • simnibs.msh.read_msh
      • simnibs.msh.write_msh

      • simnibs.msh.read_gifti_surface
      • simnibs.msh.read_curv
      • simnibs.msh.write_curv
      • simnibs.msh.read_stl
      • simnibs.msh.write_geo_spheres
      • simnibs.msh.write_geo_text

      • simnibs.msh.Elements

      • simnibs.msh.ElementData
